message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
You're lowballing me! I think I deserve more.
You think you deserve more, but I'm not giving up that much. Next round!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but not too much. Your turn!
You're still not giving me enough. I think I'm being reasonable.
You think you're being reasonable, but I'm not convinced. I'll try to do better next time.
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal. Don't expect it to get any better than this!
I'm not going to get taken advantage of. I want a better deal than that.
You think you're getting a good deal, but I'm not convinced. I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of this.
I'm not going to give up much more. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
